attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The logo (brand) launched on 4th June 2006 is a design disaster. It does not represent the Olympic spirit, London, 2012 or "Youth". 

A national pitch (competition) should be opened for anyone to undertaken.

A creative director from within the design industry should be appointed for the duration of the 2012 project.

Wolff Ollins the design agency who produced this present logo, should be removed from the project immediately and their fee of '£400,000' for held back.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
